column5: *** BUSINESS Travel or LEISURE***  ***EXCELLENT LOCATION*** the house is located in an upscale gated community, near Fiesta Texas, Cantera Mall, UTSA, Friedrich Park and many other San Antonio attractions.   My goal is to make your stay a delight. There is delicious organic coffee/teas and bottled water available for you at all times, and baked goods for breakfast.
column8: PRIVATE ROOM near EILAN FIESTA TX LA CANTERA
